column1: -Yurak infarktidan keyingi davr ‚Äì miokard infarktidan so‚Äòng yurak faoliyatini qo‚Äòllab-quvvatlash  -Diabetik nefropatiya ‚Äì qandli diabet tufayli buyrakning zararlanishi -Sklerodermik buyrak krizining oldini olish ‚Äì sklerodermiya bilan og‚Äòrigan bemorlarda buyrak bosimining keskin ko‚Äòtarilishi xavfini kamaytirish"

üß¨ Ta‚Äôsiri:

Dori shakli ruscha:
üß¨ Effect
Captopril is an angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor that relaxes blood vessels, lowers blood pressure, and reduces strain on the heart. It also improves circulation and kidney function.

ü©∫ Indications
Arterial hypertension (high blood pressure)

Chronic heart failure

Post-myocardial infarction recovery

Diabetic nephropathy

Prevention of scleroderma renal crisis

‚ö†Ô∏è Contraindications

Pregnancy and breastfeeding

Severe renal insufficiency

Allergic reactions (rash, itching)

Elevated creatinine or potassium levels in the blood

Should be taken orally, 1 hour before or during meals

Regular monitoring of blood pressure and kidney function is necessary

Qaysi kasalliklarda qo‚Äòllaniladi:
2-tur qandli diabet ‚Äì insulin yetarli ishlab chiqarilayotgan, ammo to‚Äòg‚Äòri ishlatilmaydigan holat.

Insulin qarshiligi ‚Äì hujayralar insulinga to‚Äòliq javob bermaydi, ayniqsa ortiqcha vaznda.

Polikistik tuxumdon sindromi (PCOS) ‚Äì ayollarda tuxumdon faoliyati buzilishi, gormonal nomutanosiblik.

Prediabet ‚Äì qondagi glyukoza me‚Äôyordan yuqori, lekin hali diabet emas (giperglikemiya).

Semizlik (ba‚Äôzan) ‚Äì insulin qarshiligi bilan birga kechayotgan og‚Äòir vazn muammolarida.

Gormonal buzilishlar bilan bog‚Äòliq metabolik sindrom ‚Äì ko‚Äòpincha PCOS va qandli diabet bilan birga.
Qaysi kasalliklarda qo‚Äòllaniladi eng:
Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ‚Äì when insulin is present but not used effectively by the body.

Insulin Resistance ‚Äì cells are less responsive to insulin, common in overweight individuals.

Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) ‚Äì a hormonal disorder affecting ovarian function.

Prediabetes ‚Äì elevated blood sugar levels, not yet full-blown diabetes.

Obesity (in selected cases) ‚Äì especially when related to insulin resistance.

Metabolic Syndrome ‚Äì a cluster of conditions including insulin resistance and hormonal imbalance.

üß¨ Ta‚Äôsiri
Metformin ‚Äî bu 2-tur qandli diabetda ishlatiladigan glyukozani pasaytiruvchi vosita. U jigar tomonidan glyukoza ishlab chiqarilishini kamaytiradi, mushak va hujayralar glyukozani yaxshiroq qabul qilishiga yordam beradi. Insulin sezuvchanligini oshiradi.

2-tur qandli diabet

Insulin qarshiligi (ayniqsa ortiqcha vaznli bemorlarda)

Og‚Äòir vaznni nazorat qilish (ba‚Äôzan)

‚ö†Ô∏è Qo‚Äòllash mumkin bo‚Äòlmagan holatlar

Ovqat bilan yoki ovqatdan keyin qabul qilinadi

Sport yoki og‚Äòir jismoniy ishda laktat atsidoz xavfi bo‚Äòladi

üß¨ Effect
Metformin is an oral antidiabetic drug used for type 2 diabetes. It reduces glucose production in the liver, increases insulin sensitivity, and improves glucose uptake by tissues.

ü©∫ Indications

Type 2 diabetes mellitus

Insulin resistance (often in overweight patients)

Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS)

Prediabetes

‚ö†Ô∏è Contraindications

Children under 10 years

Pregnancy and breastfeeding (unless prescribed)

‚ùó Side Effects

üìå Notes

Kidney function must be monitored regularly

Use caution with insulin

Trimol is a combined analgesic, antipyretic, and mild anti-inflammatory medication. It typically contains paracetamol and caffeine, and may include aspirin depending on the formulation.

-Fanigan is a combination medication containing diclofenac sodium (50 mg) and paracetamol (500 mg). It has analgesic, antipyretic, and anti-inflammatory properties.

Dufalac syrup is used in the treatment of the following conditions:

Ich qotishi (xronik va o‚Äòtkir)

Instruksiya (foydalanish tartibi) eng:
üß¨ Effect 
Dufalac is a gentle laxative containing lactulose. It improves bowel movement by increasing water content in the stool and promoting healthy gut bacteria. Also reduces ammonia levels in liver disease.

ü©∫ Indications
Constipation (acute or chronic)

Hemorrhoids (to soften stool and ease pain)

Hepatic encephalopathy (to lower blood ammonia)

Post-surgical recovery (to stimulate bowel movement)

Pediatric constipation

‚ö†Ô∏è Contraindications
Galactosemia

Intestinal obstruction

Allergy to lactulose

Diabetes (caution required)

‚ùó Side Effects
Bloating (gas)

Abdominal discomfort

Diarrhea at high doses

Nausea

üìå Notes
Take with a full glass of water

Best taken before breakfast

Onset of action: 24‚Äì48 hours

Dose determined by doctor (15‚Äì30 ml/day for adults)

Qaysi kasalliklarda qo‚Äòllaniladi:

Senipar og‚Äòriqni kamaytiruvchi, isitma tushiruvchi va yallig‚Äòlanishga qarshi vosita sifatida quyidagi holatlarda qo‚Äòllaniladi:

Instruksiya (foydalanish tartibi) eng:
üß¨ Composition and Effect 
Senipar contains two active ingredients:

Diclofenac sodium ‚Äì 50 mg

Paracetamol ‚Äì 500 mg

Diclofenac sodium is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces inflammation, pain, and swelling.
Paracetamol is an analgesic and antipyretic that reduces fever and relieves mild to moderate pain.

Their combination provides fast and effective relief of inflammation, pain, and fever.

ü©∫ Indications:
Headache, migraine

Toothache

Muscle and joint pain (arthritis, osteoarthritis)

Back pain, radiculitis

Menstrual pain

Post-traumatic pain

Fever and flu symptoms

‚ö†Ô∏è Contraindications:
Active gastric ulcer

Liver or kidney dysfunction

Severe heart failure

Pregnancy (3rd trimester)

Children under 12 years

Allergy to diclofenac or paracetamol

‚ùó Side Effects:
Stomach pain, nausea

Diarrhea or constipation

Dizziness or drowsiness

Skin rash or allergic reaction

Liver damage with prolonged use

üìå Dosage and Administration:
Usual dose: 1 tablet 2‚Äì3 times daily after meals

Maximum dose: Do not exceed 3 tablets/day

Swallow whole with water, do not chew or crush

ü©∫ Ursodezoksixol kislotasi (UDCA) ‚Äì Umumiy instruksiya
Ursodezoksixol kislotasi ‚Äì jigar va o‚Äòt yo‚Äòllari kasalliklarida qo‚Äòllaniladigan dori bo‚Äòlib, xolesterinli o‚Äòt toshlarini eritadi, jigar hujayralarini himoya qiladi va o‚Äòt ajralishini yaxshilaydi. üíä Qo‚Äòllanilishi va dozasi (umumiy):

Yog‚Äòli gepatoz va gepatitlar: 250‚Äì500 mg/kun ‚Äì 1‚Äì3 oy davomida.

üß¨ Ta‚Äôsiri:
Sildenafil ‚Äì fosfodiesteraza-5 (PDE5) ingibitori bo‚Äòlib, jinsiy qo‚Äòzg‚Äòalishda qon tomirlarni kengaytiradi, bu esa jinsiy olatga ko‚Äòproq qon oqimini ta‚Äôminlaydi va barqaror erektsiyani yuzaga keltiradi.

ü©∫ Qo‚Äòllaniladi:
Erektil disfunktsiya (jinsiy qo‚Äòzg‚Äòalishda yetarli erektsiyaga erisha olmaslik)

Ba'zida o‚Äòpka gipertenziyasi uchun ham (tibbiy ko‚Äòrsatma asosida)

üíä Dozalash:
Odatda boshlang‚Äòich doza ‚Äì 50 mg (jinsiy yaqinlikdan 30‚Äì60 daqiqa oldin)

Holatga qarab 25 mg dan 100 mg gacha sozlanadi

Kunlik maksimal doza: 100 mg

Ovqat bilan birga yoki och qoringa qabul qilish mumkin, ammo yog‚Äòli ovqat ta‚Äôsir boshlanishini sekinlashtiradi.

‚è± Ta‚Äôsir davomiyligi:
Ta‚Äôsiri 30‚Äì60 daqiqa ichida boshlanadi

4‚Äì6 soat davom etadi

‚ö†Ô∏è Qo‚Äòllash mumkin bo‚Äòlmagan holatlar:
Yurak-qon tomir kasalliklari (angina, yurak yetishmovchiligi)

Nitrat dorilarini qabul qilayotgan bemorlar

Og‚Äòir buyrak yoki jigar yetishmovchiligi

Arterial gipotoniyalar (past qon bosimi)

‚ùó Yon ta‚Äôsirlari:
Bosh og‚Äòrig‚Äòi, yuzda qizarish

Ko‚Äòngil aynishi, qorinda og‚Äòriq

Ko‚Äòrish buzilishi (ko‚Äòk rangli ko‚Äòrish)

Burun bitishi, bel og‚Äòrig‚Äòi

Spirtli ichimliklar ta‚Äôsirini kuchaytirishi yoki pasaytirishi mumkin

Yoshi katta erkaklarda yurak salomatligi nazorat qilinishi lozim

Qaysi kasalliklarda qo‚Äòllaniladi: Disbakterioz, diareya, antibiotik bilan bog‚Äòliq ich ketish
Instruksiya (foydalanish tartibi):
üß¨ Ta‚Äôsiri:
Bacillus clausii ‚Äî spora holatidagi foydali mikroorganizmlar bo‚Äòlib, ichak mikroflorasini tiklaydi, zararli bakteriyalarni bostiradi va ichakning normal faoliyatini ta‚Äôminlaydi. Antibiotiklarga chidamli bo‚Äòlib, antibiotik terapiyasi fonida ham samarali ishlaydi.

Ichak disbakteriozi

O‚Äòtkir va surunkali diareya

Ovqat hazm qilish buzilishi

Bolalar va chaqaloqlarda ich ketishi                                                                                                                   Flakonni silkitib, suyuqlikni bevosita ichiladi yoki suvga aralashtirib beriladi.

Juda og‚Äòir immunyetishmovchiligi (kam uchraydi)

Juda kam hollarda allergik toshma

Instruksiya (foydalanish tartibi):

ü©∫ Qo‚Äòllaniladi:

Yurak ishemik kasalligi (angina pectoris, yurak og‚Äòrig‚Äòi)

‚ö†Ô∏è Qo‚Äòllash mumkin bo‚Äòlmagan holatlar:

Allergik kon‚Äôyunktivit (ko‚Äòz qichishishi, yoshlanish)

Teri toshmalari (urtikariya), qichishish

Pollinoz (o‚Äòsimlik changlariga allergiya)

Atopik dermatit, ekzema

Allergik shishlar (Kvinke shishi)                                                                                                                                                    Dori ovqatdan qat‚Äôi nazar ichiladi. Suv bilan yutiladi yoki sirop ko‚Äòrinishida beriladi.

6 oygacha bo‚Äòlgan chaqaloqlar (ba‚Äôzi shakllarda)

Instruksiya (foydalanish tartibi):
üß¨ Ta‚Äôsiri:

ü©∫ Qo‚Äòllaniladi:
Nafas yo‚Äòllari infeksiyalari: bronxit, o‚Äòpka yallig‚Äòlanishi (pnevmoniya)

Siydik yo‚Äòllari infeksiyalari: sistit, pielonefrit

Ichak infeksiyalari: dizenteriya, salmonellyoz

Teri infeksiyalari: furunkulyoz, yiringli yaralar

Toksoplazmoz, bronxial astma fonida infeksiya                                                                                                        Tabletkani ovqatdan keyin suv bilan ichish tavsiya etiladi.

‚ö†Ô∏è Qo‚Äòllash mumkin bo‚Äòlmagan holatlar:

6 haftagacha bo‚Äòlgan chaqaloqlar

Og‚Äòir jigar yoki buyrak yetishmovchiligi

‚ùó Yon ta‚Äôsirlari:

üß¨ Faol modda:
Amlodipin (kaltsiy kanali blokatori)

Valsartan (angiotenzin II retseptori antagonisti)

üéØ Ta‚Äôsir mexanizmi:
Amlodipin: qon tomir devorlarini kengaytirib, yurakka tushadigan bosimni kamaytiradi.

Valsartan: organizmda qon bosimini oshiruvchi moddalarning ta‚Äôsirini bloklaydi.

üëâ Bu kombinatsiya yurak-qon tomir tizimiga ikki yo‚Äònalishda yordam beradi: bosimni pasaytiradi va yurak yukini yengillashtiradi.

ü©∫ Qo‚Äòllanilishi:
Arterial gipertoniya (doimiy yuqori qon bosimi)

Yurak ishemik kasalligi (ba‚Äôzan)

Insult va yurak xurujining profilaktikasi (ko‚Äòrsatmaga qarab)

üíä Dozalash:
Kombinatsiya	Qabul qilish usuli
Amlodipin 5 mg + Valsartan 80 mg	Kuniga 1 marta, og‚Äòiz orqali, ovqatdan qat‚Äôi nazar
Amlodipin 10 mg + Valsartan 160 mg	Og‚Äòir gipertoniya holatida, shifokor nazorati bilan

‚û°Ô∏è Doza bosim darajasiga va organizm javobiga qarab shifokor tomonidan individual belgilanadi.

üïê Qabul qilish tartibi:
Har kuni bir vaqtda ichiladi.

Tabletkani butun yutish lozim (chaynamaslik).

Suv bilan ichiladi, ovqatdan qat‚Äôi nazar.

‚ö†Ô∏è Ehtiyot choralari:
Homiladorlik va emizish davrida faqat shifokor nazorati bilan.

Jigar va buyrak yetishmovchiligi bo‚Äòlganlarda ehtiyotkorlik bilan.

Nafas qisishi, shishlar yoki allergik reaksiya paydo bo‚Äòlsa ‚Äì qabulni to‚Äòxtatish va shifokorga murojaat qilish.

‚ùå Qo‚Äòllash mumkin bo‚Äòlmagan holatlar:
Homiladorlik (ayniqsa 2‚Äì3 trimestrda)

Qandli diabet + alohida dori vositalari bilan birga qabul

Jiddiy buyrak yetishmovchiligi

Amlodipinga yoki valsartanga allergiya

Qaysi kasalliklarda qo‚Äòllaniladi: Qon bosimini nazorat qilish, yurak kasalliklarini oldini olish

Dozalash: Kattalar uchun kuniga 1 tabletka. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan keyin, suv bilan butun yutib ichiladi. Davolash muddati: 3 oy yoki shifokor ko‚Äòrsatmasiga ko‚Äòra. Eslatma: Temir va kaltsiy preparatlari bilan birga ehtiyotkorlik bilan ishlatiladi.

Dozalash: Kattalar uchun 100 mg dan kuniga 2‚Äì3 mahal. Bolalar uchun doza yoshga qarab aniqlanadi. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan keyin suv bilan ichiladi, chaynalmaydi. Davolash muddati: 5‚Äì10 kun. Eslatma: Uyquchanlik chaqirishi mumkin. Transport haydashda ehtiyot bo‚Äòlish kerak.

Dozalash: Kattalar uchun 200 mg dan kuniga 4 mahal. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan oldin suv bilan yutiladi. Davolash muddati: 5‚Äì7 kun (yengil holatda), 10‚Äì14 kun (og‚Äòir infeksiyada). Eslatma: Profilaktika uchun haftasiga 2 marta 200 mg qabul qilinadi.

Dozalash: Kattalar uchun kuniga 3‚Äì5 mahal, 1 tabletka. Qabul qilish usuli: Tabletka og‚Äòizda sekin so‚Äòriladi, ovqatdan keyin. Davolash muddati: 5‚Äì7 kun. Eslatma: So‚Äòrg‚Äòich tabletkani chaynab yubormaslik kerak. Ichishdan keyin 30 daqiqa hech narsa yeyilmaydi.

Dozalash: Odatda haftasiga 2 marta 0.25‚Äì0.5 mg (kattalar uchun). Doza shifokor nazoratida oshiriladi. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqat bilan birga suv bilan ichiladi. Davolash muddati: Odatda 1‚Äì3 oy, keyin tekshirish. Eslatma: Qon bosimini tushirishi mumkin, bosh aylanishi ehtimoli bor.

Dozalash: Kattalar uchun 1‚Äì2 tabletka, zaruratga ko‚Äòra har 4‚Äì6 soatda. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan keyin, suv bilan ichiladi. Davolash muddati: 3‚Äì5 kun (isitma uchun), 5‚Äì7 kun (og‚Äòriq uchun). Eslatma: Spirtli ichimliklar bilan birga ichish mumkin emas. Jigarga zarar yetkazishi mumkin.
Dozalash: 40 mg kuniga 1 marta ertalab och qoringa. Qabul qilish usuli: Suv bilan butun ichiladi. Davolash muddati: 4‚Äì8 hafta. Eslatma: Doimiy ishlatishdan oldin shifokorga murojaat qiling.
Dozalash: 10 mg (1 tabletka) kuniga 1 marta. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan qat‚Äôi nazar, suv bilan ichiladi. Davolash muddati: 7‚Äì14 kun, allergik holatga qarab. Eslatma: Uyquchanlik chaqirmaydi.

Dozalash: Kuniga 150‚Äì600 mg oralig‚Äòida, 2‚Äì3 mahalga bo‚Äòlinib. Qabul qilish usuli: Ovqatdan qat‚Äôi nazar, suv bilan yutiladi. Davolash muddati: Uzoq muddatli, shifokor nazoratida. Eslatma: Qaramlik chaqirishi mumkin. To‚Äòsatdan to‚Äòxtatmaslik kerak.
